timeline.message: old GUI removal of java and test sources

timeline.bodyText: Since String creation is relatively expensive, can this be rewritten as log.debug("( {}. ) Set Position: ", this.getAddress(), p); to avoid the call to this.getAddress() and the implicit call to p.toString() unless debugging? (In general that is the form all log.[level](...); statements should take.)
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText: @rhwood  Thank you. I will update the PR shortly.
replies.author: klk32003
